Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People have been keeping up-to-date with recent news stories. The latest headlines include discussions regarding the budget for Western Australia which will provide relief such as the $400 power credit and the concerns of those who are ineligible for housing assistance. There are also reports of police investigating a riot and calls for better conditions at Banksia Hill. The Opposition Leader will speak with Laura Tingle whilst the weather will see cooler days and chilly nights in Alice Springs.
